data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: In Britain, a broth is a soup in which there are solid pieces of meat or fish, with some vegetables. It ____ usually ____ with a stock ____ plain ____ as ____ base, with ____ or ____ added ____ being ____ to a boil, and ____ added ____. Broth ____ often ____ more ____ by ____ rice, barley ____ pulses. Broth is distinct from stock, which is a thin liquid made by simmering raw ingredients until all the taste has been retrieved from them, then sieving the resulting liquid.
data.partBlankContent: In Britain, a broth is a soup in which there are solid pieces of meat or fish, with some vegetables. It i_ usually ma__ with a stock o_ plain wa___ as i__ base, with me__ or fi__ added wh___ being bro____ to a boil, and veget_____ added la___. Broth i_ often ma__ more subst______ by add___ rice, barley o_ pulses. Broth is distinct from stock, which is a thin liquid made by simmering raw ingredients until all the taste has been retrieved from them, then sieving the resulting liquid.
data.answer: 在英国，肉汤是一种汤，里面有肉或鱼，还有一些蔬菜。它通常以高汤或白开水为基础，煮沸时加入肉或鱼，然后加入蔬菜。在肉汤中加入大米、大麦或豆类，通常会使肉汤更加浓郁。高汤不同于高汤，高汤是一种用文火煨制的稀液体，直到原料的味道都被提取出来，然后将得到的液体筛分。
